title: Oceania Tournament - A December to Remember
body:
**Dear Summoners,**

#Pacific Peninsula still needs 3-4 teams for the amateur league to run tomorrow. 
REQUIREMENTS: You MUST be ranked gold and under, to participate.

The tournament starts at 12pm Adelaide time, if you have any questions add me on skype @ helloyesiamson

**Cheers,**

_bollockz
_

replies.body: Also don't forget to follow us on: [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/pacificpninsula) and [Facebook](http://facebook.com/pacific.peninsula) to keep updated!
